org.nlpcraft.client.NCClientException

      Adds new company with given parameters.

      Adds new user to the company of the currently signed in user.
      default String NCClient.ask(String mdlId, String txt)
      Submits request for asynchronous processing.

      Submits request for asynchronous processing.

      Submits request for synchronous processing.
      NCResult NCClient.askSync(String mdlId, String txt, String data, boolean enableLog, Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Submits request for synchronous processing.
      NCClient NCClientBuilder.build()
      Builds a client instance with configured settings.
      void NCClient.cancel(Set<String> srvReqIds, Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Cancels the previously submitted sentence and removes its result, if any, from the server storage.
      List<NCResult> NCClient.check(Set<String> srvReqIds, Integer maxRows, Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Gets the status and result (OK or failure) of the previously submitted requests.
      void NCClient.clearConversation(String mdlId, Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Clears conversation context for the given model and the specified user.
      void NCClient.clearDialog(String mdlId, Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Clears the dialog flow for the given model ID and specified user.
      void NCClient.close()
      Closes the client and signs out from the REST server.
      void NCClient.deleteCompany()
      Deletes company and all its users and other associated data.
      void NCClient.deleteFeedback(Long id)
      Deletes feedback record.
      void NCClient.deleteUser(Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Deletes given user.
      List<NCFeedback> NCClient.getAllFeedback(String srvReqId, Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Gets all feedback records for given request ID and user.
      List<NCUser> NCClient.getAllUsers()
      Gets all user records for the current signed in user company.
      NCCompany NCClient.getCompany()
      Gets the company descriptor for the current signed in user.
      List<NCProbe> NCClient.getProbes()
      Gets all active (connected to the REST server) probes for the current signed in user company.
      NCUser NCClient.getUser(Long usrId, String usrExtId)
      Gets user record.
      String NCClient.resetCompanyToken()
      Sets and returns new company probe authentication token.
      void NCClient.resetUserPassword(Long id, String newPasswd)
      Resets password for the given user.
      void NCClient.updateCompany(String name, String website, String country, String region, String city, String address, String postalCode)
      Updates company information for the current signed in user.
      void NCClient.updateUser(long id, String firstName, String lastName, String avatarUrl, Map<String,String> properties)
      Updates given user.
      void NCClient.updateUserAdmin(Long id, boolean isAdmin)
      Grants or denies given user administrative privileges.
